DOC.brief_summary: The purpouse of this study is to determine the efficacy and safety of chondroitin sulphate conventional treatment in patients with both knee osteoarthritis and plaque psoriasis.
DOC.brief_title: Chondroitin Sulphate Efficay/Safety in Patients With Knee Osteoarthritis and Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: Primary knee OA according to ACR criteria; OA of radiological stages 1 to 3 according to KellgrenLawrence; VAS of pain ≥30; PASI ≥ 5. Known allergy to chondroitin sulphate; Other bone and articular diseases such as chondrocalcinosis, Paget's disease, rheumatoid arthritis, psoriatic arthritis, acromegaly, hemochromatosis, Wilson's disease; Patients with skin conditions that could interfere in the clinical trial evaluation
